text: United States Grand Prix 2021, officially Formula 1 Aramco United States Grand Prix 2021 the seventeenth round of the Formula One World Championship for the 2021 season. The Grand Prix will be held October 22–24, 2021 at Circuit of the Americas in Austin. == Entry List == Driver Team Car Engine 3 Daniel Ricciardo McLaren F1 Team McLaren MCL35M Mercedes-AMG F1 M12 1,6
